data.title: Meet the new Roku Streaming Stick (Model 3800)
data.description:
Powerful. Portable. Enhanced Voice Remote.The Roku® Streaming Stick® gives you smooth streaming at home or on-the-go.* You can even hide it behind your TV. 

Tired of juggling remotes? Our new voice remote lets you easily control your TV with buttons for TV power and volume.***

Watch what you love. Enjoy 500,000+ movies & TV episodes across thousands of free or paid channels.**

*For portability outside the house, bring your Roku remote, a wireless-connected phone/computer & USB power cable.
**Channels can change and vary by country.
***TV power and volume buttons require a compatible TV. 

Learn more and purchase here: http://bit.ly/2cVhlcN

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/roku
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RokuPlayer
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rokuplayer/
Subscribe on YouTube: http://bit.ly/SubRoku

data.title: Canada: meet the new Roku Express (Model 3900)
data.description:
Want to start streaming? Roku Express is now 5X more powerful. Our best-priced player, delivers a smooth HD streaming experience on your big-screen TV. 

It’s easy to get started. Just plug it in, connect to the Internet, and start streaming. 

Learn more about the Roku Express in Canada: http://bit.ly/2zeKCG8

data.title: Meet the new Roku Streaming Stick+ (Model 3810)
data.description:
Meet the Roku Streaming Stick+. Exceptional wireless. Stunning picture quality. Whether you’re streaming in your home or in a hotel, the advanced wireless receiver gives you 4X the range.
 
Brilliant 4K, HDR and HD. The Roku Streaming Stick+ optimizes what you’re streaming for the best picture resolution possible, whether you’re watching on an HD, 4K or HDR TV.

Tired of juggling remotes? Our new voice remote lets you easily control your TV with buttons for TV power and volume. 

Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2xUXP9x  

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/roku
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RokuPlayer
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rokuplayer/
Subscribe on YouTube: http://bit.ly/SubRoku

data.title: Meet the new Roku Ultra (Model 4660)
data.description:
Our ultimate streaming experience.The Roku Ultra is our most powerful player with our best wireless performance. 

Brilliant picture quality creates an immersive experience. Whether your TV is HD, 4K or HDR, Roku Ultra will optimize your content for the best picture resolution possible.

It’s fully loaded. Includes a new voice remote with TV power and volume buttons, private listening, lost-remote finder, access to 500,000+ movies and TV episodes and more.

data.title: How to set up the Roku Ultra (Model 4660)
data.description: Roku Ultra (model: 4660) supports 720p HD, 1080p Full HD, 4K Ultra HD (UHD) and 4K Ultra HD HDR (High Dynamic Range) and ships with an Enhanced “point-anywhere” remote with TV power and volume buttons, voice search, remote finder, gaming buttons and private listening via a headphone jack on the remote.

asset.title: How to set up the Roku Ultra (Model 4660)
asset.description:
Roku Ultra (model: 4660) supports 720p HD, 1080p Full HD, 4K Ultra HD (UHD) and 4K Ultra HD HDR (High Dynamic Range) and ships with an Enhanced “point-anywhere” remote with TV power and volume buttons, voice search, remote finder, gaming buttons and private listening via a headphone jack on the remote. 

This article describes the product in more detail and outlines the setup steps: http://bit.ly/2A4fdI2
asset.author: Roku

data.title: New Roku Streaming Stick 3600R - Quick Overview
data.description:
Big streaming power in a pocket-sized stick. The new 2016 Roku® Streaming Stick® delivers powerful performance with a quad-core processor and dual-band wireless. Access Amazon Prime Video, VUDU, Google Play, Netflix, Hulu, and more for 300,000+ movies and TV episodes.* And easily stream to different HDTVs in your home, dorm, or hotel room.

* Subscription or other payment may be required to access certain content. Channel availability subject to change and content may
not be available in all regions Roku players are sold.
